About Me

BIO

Dependable, hard-working Quality Assurance Analyst and Web Developer who excels in her attention to detail and learning new technology. Committed to putting her abilities to work in support of all data needs.

CU Denver Coding Bootcamp

Full Stack Web Development

Graduated from the intensive six month program in full-stack web development specializing in the MERN stack. Completed projects that demonstrate technologies learned such as trivia games and GIF generators to show browser side technologies, a shopping application that displays database CRUD operations, and a dog breed finder that demonstrates the MERN stack.

LFP Broadcasting LLC

Quality Assurance Analyst

Evaluate and test new and modified software programs written by the internal software development team in order to verify they function according to user requirements and program specifications. Compile and maintain technical and user documentation for internal applications and systems, specifically, testing plans and results. Recommend program improvements or corrections to software developers and provide support for in-house applications.

Colorado Satellite Broadcasting

Media Technician II

Responsible for quality control and encoding of media into required formats. Adhere to SOP of the Multi-Platform Delivery Department in the Broadcast Industry. Use self-taught Final Cut Pro software to conform movies per the company edit standards for various customers using non-linear editing systems.
